patthana8.3:4.1: Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.3:4.2: Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.3:4.3: Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.3:5.1: Nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.3:5.2: Nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.3:5.3: Nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.3:6.1: Nahetusampayuttañca nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.3:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate nava.
